1.content:
A man in a black and white suit steps out onto the stage holding a thin microphone. As he steps out, you hear the cheers of audience members that mainly consist of fat people (XD). As the cheering subsided, the black and white man said, "Hello and welcome to The Inflation Show. My name must be confined to the public as it is very wrong. Uh, let us start our torturement-I mean-pleasurement show by bringing out our contestants of inflation." As the door opens, the audience cheers for the door to hurry up. As the door is completely open, 20 (and ONLY 20) contestant of different looks came out. They all stood shoulder to shoulder, awaiting the selection of today's victim. "Alright," the host said, "Our victim of the day is........"

(Please choose the victim.)
1.title: The Inflation Show on ABC (LOL)

11.content:
He read his card that he has. He says what is on the card, "Princess Blaze!" The audience cheers for her as she walks up next to the host. The other 19 contestants go backstage and await for their arrival back on stage. "Alright then," the host says, "Now that our contestant has been chosen, we must do the 6 selectors of inflation and see how she will do in her inflation. So let us bring up the random selectors!" 6 machines are revealed behind a large door and start randomizing different things.

(First machine: Clothing.)
11.title: The Princess of Inflation (LOL)

114.content:
(See DepecheSonic on deviantART for what it looks like.)

The first machine started to slow down. "And you will be wearing..." the host said. It started to stop on Swimwear, but it then notched down to Special Clothing. "The Special Clothing!" The audience cheered for the selection. "Now let's wait on the other machines," the host said.


(Second Machine: Inflation Location)
114.title: Machine 2, Go! (oops wrong series)

choices: Body (Not including the limbs and head)
1143.title: More

11432.content:
As the body analyzer (the second machine) slowed down, the host said, "And you'll be inflating in...." The body analyzer's lights then stopped flashing and only the body lit up. "The body!" The audience cheered for the selection.


(Third Machine: Inflation Type)
11432.title: TAC-3, Go! (Wrong series again)

114322.content: (Please select your inflation type.)
114322.title: Other

1143221.content:
As the matter selector (the 3rd machine) started to slow down, the host said, "And you will be filled with....." It then came to a stop on Liquid. "Liquid!" The audience cheered for the selection.


(Fourth Machine: Type of Inflation)
1143221.title: F4, GO! (wrong damn series again)

11432212.content: (Please select your inflation type.)
11432212.title: Other

114322121.content:
As the content selector slowed down, the host said, "And it's....." It completely stops on Juice. "Juice!" The audience cheers for the selection.


(Fifth Machine: Locale Chooser)
114322121.title: Five's got the Jive!

choices: You will be prone to popping.
114322121221.content:
As the Locale Chooser slows down, the hosts says, "And you will be......." It then stops at Home. "At your house!" The audience cheers, but immediately goes silent after all the lights focus on the penalty machine as it starts up.


(Final Machine: Penalty Machine)
114322121221.title: Final Machine!

choices: You will develop harmful and toxic smoke to the color of your juice.
1143221212212.title: Other

choices: Your clothes will rip to shreds realistically with your inflation.
11432212122122.title: Other

choices: Yes (It's all you from here. Just keep the selections of the machines.)
1143221212212222.content:
(Please note that vaginas and nipples are shown in every woman inflation.)

As the crowd is silent, the penalty machine comes closer to its penalty. It then stops on a round ball with a 2X next to it. "Wow," the host says, "Double Size. That's a big one. So are you ready Miss Blaze?"
1143221212212222.title: Ready?

1552.content:
The machine spit out a card and the announcer read it carefully. "Today's lucky star is Manic the Hedgehog!"
The audience applauded widely.
"He will be wearing...''
1552.title: Manic

15533222222.content: (You must select one of the two now.)
15533222222.title: Final Two

info.description: This is how inflation was meant to be. There are no rules to this story. No limits. No restrictions. This is how inflation is in real life. But please keep it Sonic and inflation. And keep it in the format of a gameshow. Now then, enter the world of inflation like you are now. And prepare to have your mind blown at the possibilities of inflation.
